Package me.zpath

Interface EvalFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
BfoJsonFactory, DomFactory, GsonFactory, JavaCollectionFactory
public interface EvalFactory
A EvalFactory creates an EvalContext that can be used to evaluate an object. Multiple EvalFactories are registered with a Configuration - when ZPath.eval(java.lang.Object) is called, they are evaluated in turn to find one capable of traversing the object.
See Also:
  • Configuration.getFactories()

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    EvalContext
    create(Object o, Configuration config)
    Create a new EvalContext, or return null if this factory doesn't apply to this type of object

  • Method Details

    • create

      EvalContext create(Object o, Configuration config)
      Create a new EvalContext, or return null if this factory doesn't apply to this type of object
      Parameters:
      o - the object that will be parsed by the returned EvalContext
      config - the Configuration
      Returns:
      the EvalContext or null if the factory doesn't apply
